name: Dolphin Ride
description:
*** Help the little dolphin to take his friends safely home. Avoid obstacles and swim as far as you can.

Dolphin Ride is a fun, happy and addicting game with beautiful graphics, cute characters, and catchy music and sound effects.
Easy one button control and fluid ride through a magical underwater world.

***** Featured at appadvice.com: http://appadvice.com/appnn/2011/11/quickadvice-dolphinride *******

The Story:
Once upon a time, a little dolphin got stuck in an oil spill far away in the sea.
He was very scared because he couldn't move in the thick sticky oil.
But he was very lucky because his friends (the crab, the octopus and the starfish) suddenly appeared from below.
It took them a lot of time to save him from the evil black oil monster. But finally they managed to pull him out of the oil and take him to a safe and clean place to recover.
The little dolphin got well soon and he was very grateful that they saved his life. As a thank you he promised to give them a ride to their home any time they want.
They lived happily ever after.

Dolphin Ride Objectives:

- Swim as far as you can
- Pick up your friends (the crab, the octopus and the starfish) and take them home
- Avoid obstacles
- Collect 5 stars to get extra life
- Get all the 9 achievements
- and most importantly have fun and enjoy the ride.

YouTube search: "Dolphin Ride game"
